# macOS
.DS_Store

# Node.js
node_modules/
npm-debug.log*
yarn-debug.log*
yarn-error.log*
pnpm-debug.log*

# Logs
logs/
*.log
npm-debug.log*
yarn-debug.log*
lerna-debug.log*

# OS generated files
Thumbs.db
Desktop.ini

# Editor directories and files
.idea/
.vscode/
*.sublime-workspace
*.sublime-project

# Environment variables
.env
.env.*.local

# Compiled source #
###################
dist/
build/
out/
*.tsbuildinfo

# Dependency directories
bower_components/
jspm_packages/
vendor/

# Coverage directory used by tools like istanbul
coverage/

# Optional npm cache directory
.npm

# Optional eslint cache
.eslintcache

# Optional REPL history
.node_repl_history

# Misc
*.tgz
.cache/
.parcel-cache/
.next/
.nuxt/
.svelte-kit/
